title: Story Generator
description: A single-page web app that generates a story based on user input.

interactions.description: User inputs story parameters and clicks Generate Story button
Generate Story button is clicked, generating a story based on user input

acceptance_criteria.description: The app displays an input form for users to provide story parameters
When the Generate Story button is clicked, the app generates and displays a story preview
The generated story includes the user's username, theme, and genre
